response.name: Success
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 331,
        "title": "Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship",
        "isbn": "9780132350884",
        "authorName": "Robert C. Martin",
        "price": 59.99,
        "genre": "Computing & Software Engineering",
        "published": "2008-08-01",
        "description": "Even bad code can function. But if code isn’t clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees. This book presents principles, patterns, and practices of writing clean code, case studies, and heuristics for developers.",
        "pageCount": 464,
        "coverImageUrl": "https://covers1.booksamillion.com/covers/bam/0/13/235/088/0132350882_b.jpg"
    },
    {
        "id": 332,
        "title": "The Great Gatsby",
        "isbn": "9780743273565",
        "authorName": "F. Scott Fitzgerald",
        "price": 15.99,
        "genre": "Fiction",
        "published": "1925-04-10",
        "description": "The Great Gatsby is a novel set in the Jazz Age on Long Island, near New York City, and follows narrator Nick Carraway’s interactions with Jay Gatsby, a mysterious millionaire obsessed with reuniting with his former lover Daisy Buchanan.",
        "pageCount": 180,
        "coverImageUrl": "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81af+MCATTL.jpg"
    }
]
